Text: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
Author: Kevin Kruse

Text: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
Author: Albert Einstein

Text: Insanity is doing the same thing over and over again expecting different results.
I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took an excuse.
Author: Florence Nightingale

Text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
Author: Wayne Gretzky's Coach

Text: You can't score if you don't shoot.
Author: Sports Proverb

Text: You can't hit the ball if you don't swing.
Author: John R. Tunis

Text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
Author: Amelia Earhart

Text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
Author: Babe Ruth

Text: Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and being.
Author: Kevin Kruse

Text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
Author: John Lennon

Text: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Source: Strengthen Your Group: Essentials in an Aimless World

Text: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don�t have any.
Author: Alice Walker

Text: A lie can travel around the world and back again while the truth is lacing up its boots.
Author: Mark Twain

Text: The best time to plant a tree was 30 years ago; the second best time is today.
Author: Anonymous Proverb

Text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
Author: Steve Jobs

Text: They may forget what you said; but they will never forget how you made them feel.
Author: Carl W. Buehner

Text: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
Author: Jim Rohn

Text: Whether you believe you can do a thing or not, you are right.
Author: Henry Ford

Text: There is just news. There is no good or bad.
Author: Master Oogway

Text: Quit; don't quit. Noodles; don't noodles...
Author: Master Oogway

Text: One often meets his destiny on the road he takes to avoid it.
Author: Master Oogway

Text: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift; that is why it is called the present.
Author: Master Oogway

Text: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
Author: Steve Jobs

Text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Author: Les Brown

Text: I definitely need to use my chances when they come because definitely there won't be many.
Author: Roger Federer

Text: If you can meet with Triumph and Disaster, and treat those two impostors just the same.
Author: Rudyard Kipling

Text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born, and the day you find out why.
There is only one way to avoid criticism; do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
Author: Elbert Hubbard

Text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
Author: Ancient Indian Proverb

Text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Author: Theodore Roosevelt

Text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Author: George Addair

Text: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
Author: Plato

Text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Author: Arthur Ashe

Text: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
Author: Japanese Proverb

Text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
Author: Confucius

Text: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
Author: Anne Frank
Source: The Diary of a Young Girl

Text: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
Author: Vicki Corona

Text: Happiness is not something readymade. It comes from your own actions.
Author: Dalai Lama

Text: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
Author: Latin Proverb

Text: You can't fall if you don't climb. But there's no joy in living your whole life on the ground.
Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
Author: Les Brown

Text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
Author: Booker T. Washington

Text: I didn't fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
Author: Albert Einstein

Text: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
Author: Roger Staubach

Text: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
Author: Farrah Gray

Text: Education costs money; but then so does ignorance.
Author: Sir Claus Moser

Text: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
Author: Rosa Parks

Text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Author: Confucius

Text: You can't use up creativity; the more you use, the more you have.
Author: Maya Angelou

Text: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.
Author: Teddy Roosevelt

Text: Dream big and dare to fail.
Author: Norman Vaughan

Text: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Text: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
Author: Gloria Steinem

Text: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
Author: Beverly Sills

Text: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Text: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
Author: Henry Ford

Text: It's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Text: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, "I'm possible"!
Author: Audrey Hepburn

Text: If today was your last day, would you live it like your last?
Author: Nickelback
Source: Song "If Today Was Your Last Day"

Text: You can't give up when you're lookin' for a diamond in the rough.
Author: Nickelback

Text: You mustn't allow yourself to be chained to fate, to be ruled by your genes. Human beings can choose the kind of life that they want to live. What's important is that you choose life... and then live.
Author: Naomi Hunter

Text: Life isn't just about passing on your genes. We can leave behind much more than just DNA. Through speech, music, literature and movies... what we've seen, heard, felt... anger, joy and sorrow... these are the things I will pass on.
Author: Solid Snake

Text: Do. Or do not. There is no try.
Author: Yoda

Text: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
Author: Albus Dumbledore
Source: Book: "Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"

Text: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
Author: Albus Dumbledore
Source: Film: "Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"

Text: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
Author: Amy March

Text: You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Text: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Author: Lao Tzu

Text: Faith is the bird that feels the light and sings when the dawn is still dark.
Author: Rabindranath Tagore

Text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Author: Robert Collier

Text: Not all those who wander are lost.
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien

Text: The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Source: Astrophysics for People in a Hurry

Text: Not only do we live among the stars, the stars live within us.
Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

Text: In life and in the universe it's always best to keep looking up.
Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

Text: Life moves pretty fast. If you don't stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.
Author: Ferris Bueller

Text: Oh yes, the past can hurt. But you can either run from it, or learn from it.
Author: Rafiki

Text: There is a difference between knowing the path and walking the path.
Author: Morpheus

Text: Why do we fall, sir? So that we can learn to pick ourselves up.
Author: Alfred Pennyworth

Text: Be curious, not judgmental.
Author: Ted Lasso

Text: I look up at the night sky, and I know that, yes, we are part of this Universe, we are in this Universe, but perhaps more important than both of those facts is that the Universe is in us.
Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

Text: My view is that if your philosophy is not unsettled daily then you are blind to all the universe has to offer.
Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

Text: We are stardust brought to life, then empowered by the universe to figure itself out�and we have only just begun.
Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Source: Astrophysics for People in a Hurry

Text: Science literacy is a vaccine against the charlatans of the world that would exploit your ignorance.
Author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
Source: The Sky Is Not the Limit

Text: Everyone you will ever meet knows something you don't.
Author: Bill Nye
Source: Unstoppable: Harnessing Science to Change the World

Text: We are going to die, and that makes us the lucky ones. Most people are never going to die because they are never going to be born.
Author: Richard Dawkins
